admission_text:
## BE INSPIRED BY FLIGHT!

There is something magical about flight, no matter what age you are. The joy in the eyes of a toddler is equally inspiring to us as the trained and knowledgeable eye of a veteran experiencing the treasures of The Hangar Flight Museum for the first time. We recommend you plan at least an hour to explore the Museum, though you could certainly spend longer to delve deeper into the stories of the men and women who made Canadian aviation what it is today. 

## UPCOMING EVENTS

See what's up at The Hangar and check out the [Upcoming Events page](/upcoming-events) for more info. 

> It's a great collection of aircraft reflecting the growth of aviation in Canada. Great staff with very friendly attitudes and information!

## 

Purchase Your Timed Ticket

online ticket purchasing is currently available

[BOOK NOW](https://www.etix.com/ticket/v/16725/the-hangar-flight-museum)

## 

## ADMISSION RATES

**Adult** \- - - $17.00

**Senior** _(65+)_ \- - - $12.00

**Student** _(12-17 or with valid student ID)_ \- - - $12.00

**Child**  _(3-11)_ \- - - $9.00

**Free children**  _(0-2)_ \- - - FREE

**Family**  _(includes two adults and up to_

 _four children under the age of 18)_ \- - - $45.00

Save on multiple visits by purchasing a [membership!](https://thehangarmuseum.ca/become-member)

We are closed on Mondays from October 1 - April 30.

##  Sponsorship Opportunities for 2026 Induction Ceremony 

  * #####  Hosted by Porter Airlines 

Proud sponsor and gracious host

of the 2026 Ceremony

  * #####  DONATE 

Help us keep Canada’s aviation legacy aloft.

Your contribution fuels the future of flight.

  * #####  Gala Location 

Porter Airlines Maintenance Facility  
280 Convair Private  
Ottawa, Ontario  
K1V 2E5

###  Nominations for the 2026 Induction Ceremony 

  * #####  Nominate an Individual 

[As a contribution to Canada's heritage, to document, preserve and publicize the names and deeds of these persons whose contributions to the advancement of Canadian aerospace have been of superior benefit to Canada.](https://form.jotform.com/200476535362050)

  * #####  Nominate for the Belt of Orion 

[The Belt of Orion Award for Excellence was founded by Canada's Aviation Hall of Fame to honour organizations, groups, societies or associations who have made outstanding contributions to the advancement of aviation in Canada.](https://form.jotform.com/200485014188048)

  * #####  Nominate for Canada's Aviation Disctinction Award 

[Canada's Aviation Distinction Award recognizes an individual or organization whose work has made a meaningful and lasting contribution to aviation or aerospace in Canada.](https://form.jotform.com/260056553784260)

collections_text:
# A MUSEUM WITH ALTITUDE!

## plan your visit today

[Get Tickets](https://www.etix.com/ticket/v/16725/the-hangar-flight-museum) [Membership](/become-member) [Gift Shop](/gift-shop) [Events](/upcoming-events)

Hours 

Mon: CLOSED

Fri: 10am-4pm

Tues: 10am-4pm

Sat: 10am-4pm

Wed: 10am-4pm

Sun: 10am-4pm

Thurs: 10am-4pm

Plan your visit to The Hangar Flight Museum to learn about western Canada’s aviation history. Located in a drill hall that was built as part of the British Commonwealth Air Training Plan during the Second World War, this Calgary attraction is a hidden gem and a must-see destination. We are passionate about bringing aviation history to life and trust that a visit to our museum will leave you inspired with dreams of flight! Looking to get a tour inside one of our aircraft? We offer this experience during the summer on weekends - June 2026 will begin the next season. We are currently completing phased truss strengthening to protect the wooden beams of our historic building's roof system. This construction work means our elevator to reach our mezzanine level is currently not in use.
